title: Ummm ok im an english speaking player looking for a clash team (mid to high gold)
body:
Not being a jerk just honestly got deleted as soon as I typed "yeah dude i can play anywhere" boom deleted. 

yes this account says im an adc main but if you need someone add me and ill give you my other account names and you can decide from there :) 

I'm aussie/greek

replies.body: in total, including this account, i have 3 golds 1 silver
